prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric fish with a rocky texture and vibrant colors.
I want a Pokemon inspired by deep-sea creatures, featuring a sturdy body and unique fins.
Generate an ancient-looking fish Pokemon that showcases both resilience and adaptability in its design.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the ocean floor, with earthy tones and rugged features.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a blend of aquatic and rocky characteristics, perfect for underwater battles.
Design a Pokemon that reflects the mysteries of the sea, with a blend of rocky and marine elements.
Show me a Pokemon that combines the strength of rock with the fluidity of water in its appearance.

distinctive_features: A single red dot on its forehead
